Name: Failure Drill
About the game: In this 2D, story driven singleplayer adventure game set in the near future, the player controls a schoolgirl named Claire during her journey to find purpose and acceptance as a military cadet in a mysterious war, while also attempting to understand the often-overlooked enigmas her identity and reality hinged upon before enlisting. This game is a story-rich drama with psychological horror themes and stylized 2D art.
